mapper.select:
select * from BOARD
where b_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

order by b_writeday desc
order by p_pay desc

mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (b_loginid ,b_title, b_content, b_photo, b_readcount,b_writeday) values(#{b_loginid},#{b_title},#{b_content},#{b_photo},0,now())
insert into B_COMMENT (b_num, bc_loginid, bc_content, bc_writeday) values (#{b_num}, #{bc_loginid}, #{bc_content},now())
mapper.select: select * from B_COMMENT where b_num=#{b_num} order by bc_num desc
